Docs.summary: This should indicate a path within the doc/public directory next to the TLC solution, where the documentation lies. This value will be used as part of a URL, so, the path separator should be phrased as '/' forward slashes rather than backslashes.

Docs.summary: The type that contains the construction method, whether static Instance property, static Create method, or constructor. Of course, a constructor is only permissible if this type derives from InstanceType. This defaults to the same as InstanceType.
